sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Stack,
  HStack,
  VStack,
  Input,
  FormControl,
  FormLabel,
  InputGroup,
  InputRightElement,
  Button,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

const Signup = () => {
  const [show, setShow] = React.useState(false);
  const handleClick = () => setShow(!show);

  return (
    <VStack>
      <FormControl>
        <FormLabel color="white" margin="0">
          Name
        </FormLabel>
        <Input
          background="white"
          w="80%"
          marginBottom="2"
          placeholder="Enter Name"
          _placeholder={{ opacity: 0.5, color: "blue" }}
        ></Input>
        <FormLabel color="white" margin="0">
          Email
        </FormLabel>
        <Input
          background="white"
          w="80%"
          marginBottom="2"
          placeholder="Enter Email"
          _placeholder={{ opacity: 0.5, color: "blue" }}
        ></Input>
        <FormLabel color="white" margin="0">
          Password{" "}
        </FormLabel>
        <InputGroup size="md">
          <Input
            pr="4.5rem"
            type={show ? "text" : "password"}
            placeholder="Enter password"
            _placeholder={{ opacity: 0.5, color: "blue" }}
            background="white"
            w="80%"
            margin="3px"
          />
          <InputRightElement width="4.5rem">
            <Button h="1.75rem" size="sm" onClick={handleClick}>
              {show ? "Hide" : "Show"}
            </Button>
          </InputRightElement>
        </InputGroup>
        <FormLabel color="white" margin="0">
          Confirm Password{" "}
        </FormLabel>
        <InputGroup size="md">
          <Input
            pr="4.5rem"
            type={show ? "text" : "password"}
            placeholder="Confirm password"
            _placeholder={{ opacity: 0.5, color: "blue" }}
            background="white"
            w="80%"
            margin="3px"
          />
          <InputRightElement width="4.5rem">
            <Button h="1.75rem" size="sm" onClick={handleClick}>
              {show ? "Hide" : "Show"}
            </Button>
          </InputRightElement>
        </InputGroup>
        <FormLabel color="white" margin="0">
          {" "}
          Upload Profile{" "}
        </FormLabel>
        <Input marginBottom="2" type="file" border="0" margin="3px"></Input>

        <Button w="100%" color="blue">
          {" "}
          SignUp
        </Button>
      </FormControl>
    </VStack>
  );
};

export default Signup;
